quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Friends are the family you choose.
author: Jess C. Scott

quote: A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.
author: Arnold H. Glasgow

quote: A true friend freely, advises justly, assists readily, adventures boldly, takes all patiently, defends courageously, and continues a friend unchangeably.
author: William Penn

quote: A friend is one that knows you as you are, understands where you have been, accepts what you have become, and still, gently allows you to grow.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: The love of a family is life's greatest blessing.
author: Eva Burrows

quote: The most important thing in the world is family and love.
author: John Wooden

quote: It's not what we have in life, but who we have in our life that matters.
author: Margaret Laurence

quote: The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege.
author: Charles Kuralt

quote: The greatest gift you can give someone is your time, because when you give your time, you are giving a portion of your life that you will never get back.
author: Rick Warren

quote: Friends are the siblings God never gave us.
author: Mencius

quote: Family and friends are hidden treasures, seek them and enjoy their riches.
author: Wanda Hope Carter

quote: What is a friend? A single soul dwelling in two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: Friendship is the hardest thing in the world to explain. It's not something you learn in school. But if you haven't learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learned anything.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
author: Jim Morrison

quote: Friendship is a plant of slow growth and must undergo and withstand the shocks of adversity before it is entitled to the appellation.
author: George Washington

quote: Rare as is true love, true friendship is rarer.
author: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: Friends are God's way of taking care of us.
author: Unknown

quote: Good friends are like stars. You don't always see them, but you know they're always there.
author: Unknown

quote: True friends are never apart, maybe in distance but never in heart.
author: Unknown

quote: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: A single rose can be my garden... a single friend, my world.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Friendship isn't about who you've known the longest. It's about who walked into your life, said 'I'm here for you,' and proved it.
author: Unknown

quote: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Family is not an important thing. It's everything.
author: Michael J. Fox

quote: The family is the first essential cell of human society.
author: Pope John XXIII

quote: In family life, love is the oil that eases friction, the cement that binds closer together, and the music that brings harmony.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
author: David Ogden Stiers

quote: Other things may change us, but we start and end with the family.
author: Anthony Brandt

quote: Family is the most important thing in the world.
author: Princess Diana

quote: To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there.
author: Barbara Bush

quote: Having a place to go is a home. Having someone to love is a family. Having both is a blessing.
author: Donna Hedges

quote: The family is one of nature's masterpieces.
author: George Santayana

quote: You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: In time of test, family is best.
author: Burmese Proverb

quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life.
author: Richard Bach

quote: Family and friendships are two of the greatest facilitators of happiness.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The greatest gift of family life is to be intimately acquainted with people you might never even introduce yourself to, had life not done it for you.
author: Kendall Hailey

quote: Family is not defined by our genes; it is built and maintained through love.
author: Unknown
